data.title: Allow a user to change a loop settiong in MusicRoom in a game.
data.body:
I allow a user to chose the setting from loop/sequence/random/nothing in a game.

I added actions.

MusicRoom.Init()
This must be called before opening the music room screen to prevent actions being also called when opening a music room screen.

example
         textbutton "MusicRoom" [Show("MusicRoom"),mr.Init()]

MusicRoom.ToggleLoop()
enable looping
MusicRoom.ToggleSequence()
enable advancing
MusicRoom.ToggleRandam()
enable randam playing

sample
https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/122050682/test-1.0-all.zip

data.title: fix_music_room
data.body: the **init** method of Action is called many times, so I moved last_playing into MusicRoom.

data.title: add MusicRoom.add action keyword argument
data.body:
I added keyword argument "action" to MusicRoom.add.

```
            def add(self, filename, action=None, always_unlocked=False)
            `action`
                This is a action or the list of actions. these are called when this
                file is played.

                For example, These actions is used to change a screen or background, description
                by the playing file, and allowing multiple pages by single MusicRoom instance.
```

data.title: Preferences.voice sustain
data.body:
I allowed a user to determine whether voices were sustained through the current interaction.

I added three actions.
         \* Preference("voice sustain", "enable")  - Sustain voice through the current interaction.
         \* Preference("voice sustain", "disable") - Don't sustain voice through the current interaction.
         \* Preference("voice sustain", "toggle")  - Toggle sustain voice.
And I used all_character_callbacks to implement this future.
Default to False

data.title: add preferences.wait_voice
data.body:
I allowed a user to determine whether wait a voice in auto-foward mode.
I added three actions.
         \* Preference("wait voice", "enable")  - Dnable auto-forwarding when a voice is playing.
         \* Preference("wait voice", "disable") - Eisable auto-forwarding when a voice is playing.
         \* Preference("wait voice", "toggle")  - Toggle auto-forwarding when a voice is playing.

Default to True.

data.title: show the newest file
data.body:
Ren'Py will tell the newest file.
![screenshot0001](https://f.cloud.github.com/assets/1556311/1186847/a1236306-2329-11e3-8a73-e880ed140e96.png)

data.title: Avoid importing python modules into the store without an _ prefix.
double percent signs cause a bug the second time around
data.body: See https://bugs.launchpad.net/renpy/+bug/1223177?comments=all

data.title: Allow accent in the PATH of Ren'Py directory
data.body: Before the change, you get an uncaught exception when there is an accent in the Path. With that change, it works.

data.title: Update cache in save()
data.body: This fixed the issue #147.

data.title: A screenshot of autosave isn't display correctly
data.body:
v6.15.7374
A screenshot of autosave isn't displayed correctly, but I can load it correctly.

1 Start "tutorial" and start the game.
2 Open the Menu and the autosave page.
3. Chose "Quit" button and reply "No".
4 And trying No3 many many times.

![45ecffb0-0a38-11e3-88f8-b7a35eac5df9](https://f.cloud.github.com/assets/1556311/1130077/f1b2a3da-1b9b-11e3-9e2d-92a51ed659dd.png)

data.title: full screen issue in windows7
data.body:
I have full screen issue.
I try to run the tutorial in full screen mode, but a performance error was caused.

1:Run tutorial.
2:Set full screen mode and Quit game.
3:Run tutorial again.

I tried it in windows7sp1 x86/x64, intel hd graphics3000/radeon hd6950 but error was caused in all case.
But in windows xp,Ubuntu13.04 this was not caused.
And this error was caused after v6.15.0.274, but not in v6.14.1.366

data.title: Sphinx gettext
data.body:
This branch supports translating documentation.

It adds compile-po and gettext target to sphinx/Makefile. gettext target makes pot files for documentation, and compile-po target compile translated po files.

To make translated documentation, run "make html" with LANGUAGE environment variable like this:
$ LANGUAGE=ja make html (for Japanese translation)

Japanese translation is written in the following site:
https://translations.launchpad.net/renpy-doc
Translated po files are here:
http://bazaar.launchpad.net/~vbkaisetsu/renpy-doc/renpy-doc-translation/files

data.body:
This branch adds MultiCharacter which shows two or more dialogues in a window.

Here is an example script and a screen shot.

data.title: set mousedown_5 to dissmiss
data.body:
I think a mouse wheel is very useful to read VN, and many games support it.
So, should renpy support it in default.

data.body: http://lemmasoft.renai.us/forums/viewtopic.php?f=8&t=22959

data.title: fix the document of Stop action
data.body: You use the same explanation for Stop as Play.

data.title: Scene skip
data.body:
I allowed ren'py to ask a player to start fast skipping automatically when enter the seen label, that is like fate/stay night.

I added three actions:
         \* Preference("scene skip", "enable") - enable scene_skip
         \* Preference("scene skip", "disable") - disable scene_skip
         \* Preference("scene skip", "toggle") - Toggle scene_skip

I added two config variable:
    config.default_scene_skip - if not None, the default value of scene_skip
    config.except_labels - the list of labels which should be ignored by scene_skip. 

scene_skip defaults to False
sample https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/122050682/the_question-1.0-all.zip

I add labels which have "_" prefix or "_screen" suffix and following labels to ignore as special labels.
["enter_game_menu", "after_load", "splashscreen", "before_main_menu", "confirm_quit", "main_menu", "quit"]
Are there other special labels which should be ignored?

data.title: fix spellmiss
data.body: I found spell miss.

data.title: add FilePageNext and FilePagePrevious a toggle function
data.body: I allowed a file page to toggle.

data.title: config.has_quicksave defaults to True
data.body:
In the template, the "quick" page is shown, but then config.has_quicksave defaults to False.
Should ren'py unify to one?

data.title: Can't show Chinese characters
data.body:
Hi,
I'm trying to make a game in Chinese and in the game those Chinese characters look like .
I've also tried in Japanese and it has the same problem.
I'm using renpy 6.15.7.374 on Ubuntu 12.04. I'm using jEdit as the code editor now but I've tried Editra and gedit (and they can't solve the problem). I've also tried different encodings but it doesn't work.
(Sorry I can't upload images... (It seems Github can't process those images?
Thanks :)

data.title: fix the spell miss in involke_yesno_prompt
data.body: I found the spell miss in involke_yesno_prompt.

data.title: return_by_rclick
data.body:
Ren'py have two problems about rclick and autosave.

1: When the screen "yesno_prompt" is shown by quickmenu, a user can't close it by rclick but open the game menu over it.
2: Autosave is done in main menu when click the close button. It is because main_menu is set False.

I set config.quit_action to Quit() if ren'py has screen "yesno_prompt" and allowed ren'py to close screen "yesno_prompt" by rclick if it was being shown by Quit() to fix these problem.

But this has issue, if a user use label "comfirm_quit", it isn't executed.

data.title: License problem in android document
data.body:
The android document contains screen-shots which is taken in windows.
However, it's not free. Ren'Py is distributed under free licenses, so it conflicts with other licenses.

Please remove it or replace by free images (e.g. screen-shot in linux)

data.title: fix documentation errors
data.body:
This branch fixes spelling errors and Japanese translation errors.

This branch doesn't fix but "Styling Fixed Rollback" section in save_load_rollback.rst is wrong.
The actual default value of config.fix_rollback_without_choice is False, but the document says "selected".

data.title: close screen "yesno_prompt" by rclick
data.body:
When the screen "yesno_prompt" is shown by quickmenu,  a rclick can't close it but open the game menu.
So I fixed this.

Issue: no_action isn't done if screen is closed by the rclick.

data.title: Load newest
data.body:
I added the new action LoadNewest which load the newest file.
It will be unnecessary to open the load page and click the load button.

data.title: can also fast_skip by menu.
data.body: I enabled ren'py to do fast_skip by the game menu
